ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and return to his family joyfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And will return to his people full of joy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and shall return to his people joyfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and they will return to their people, delighted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And he will return to his family rejoicing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And will return to his family Masrur (in joy)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he shall go back to his people joyful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he will return to his family joyfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And will return unto his folk in joy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he shall return to his people, joyfully,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he shall return Unto his people joyfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and he will return to his folks joyfully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he will turn to his people, rejoicing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And will return to his family in joy!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and will return rejoicing to his family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And will return to his family delighted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And return to his people in happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:9] and return to his family, in Paradise, joyful, because of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And will return) in the Hereafter (unto his folk) whom Allah prepared for him in Paradise (in joy) with them. 742
